duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for ensuring high standards of clinical data integrity and quality in alignment with critical research efforts in oncology.
Provide support to research coordinators in patient enrollment, data collection, and data query activities.
Maintain regulatory documentation for all assigned sites and study staff.
Perform QC audits of the clinical database and support adherence to Good Clinical Practices (GCP) guidelines.
Work closely with the onsite team to confirm appropriate consenting and accurate data abstraction.
Communicate effectively with the research team, study sponsor, and ancillary staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred, 3-5 years of experience in data collection activities within a GCP/clinical research regulatory environment
